page.title: 11TRANSPORT (East Block)
page.content: Instead of going from place to place by{walking}or by{horse and cart}as people did in the past, we would probably go by {car, bicycle, bus,}or {train.} The only type of{roads}in our squares are single{carriageway}or{estate roads where the speed limit is 30 or 40 M.P. H. The bus services are run by {Lincolnshire Road Car}and{Lincoln City {Transport}who operate 9 buses through squares 9469, 9470, 9569 and 1 bus through square 9571. There are no bus services in squares 9471 or 9570 because there are no roads or houses. There are no bus stations in any of the squares so all of the buses pass through. Between 0700 and 2300 hours about{105 buses}pass through the area, this means that there are about{6 {buses}an hour in sqs. 9469,9470 and 9570.
